name: BALL BUSTERS (tedbolt)
description:
BALL BUSTERS

----------------------

Ludum Dare 42 Entry

Players will be placed in the wrong side of the arkanoid field. They must survive the onslaught of the bat and it's ball to win. Get the ball passed the bat 3 times to win but you must do that before you die 3 times.

1 Player Mode

  • Defeat the bat by getting the ball past it
  • Reflect the ball with your bullets
  • Protect your platforms
  • Stun the bat with your bullets
  • Watch out for the drills that destroy a column of platforms

2 Player Mode

  • Go head to head with a friend
  • The bat must defeat the player by hitting themwith drills, the ball or destroying all the platforms
  • The player must survive and get the ball passed the bat
